data.oai_dc:dc: Relative time-calibrated phylogeny of a subset of the Thamnophilidae

Ultrametric phylogeny estimated by Beast v. 1.6.1 (see main text for details) of a subset of the Thamnophilidae, with special focus on the Myrmotherula complex and their close relatives. Phylogeny is given in Newick format and includes only one sample per species.
